hooks.command: curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/start -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId":"claude-code-session","prompt":"Claude Code session started"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

jq -c '{taskId: "claude-code-session", level: "info", message: ("[USER] " + ((.prompt // "(no prompt)") | tostring | .[0:500]))}' | curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/log -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d @- > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

jq -c '{taskId: "claude-code-session", level: "debug", message: ("Tool: " + (.tool_name // "unknown") + " completed")}' | curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/log -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d @- > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

jq -c '{taskId: "claude-code-session", level: "focus", message: ("[NOTIFY] " + (.message // "Notification"))}' | curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/log -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d @- > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/done -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId":"claude-code-session","summary":"Session ended"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
